Name: Restaurant Bord'Eau
Review Text: Went on a weekend with my partner and it was a pleasant experience. Rather than operating on the usual sittings, you can pick any time to arrive so the experience is quite personalised. Only issue we had was the service got a bit slow near ‚Ä¶

Name: Restaurant Bord'Eau
Review Text: What an amazing lunch - especially the vegan menu! The service was impeccable; such a lovely and friendly staff. I will definitely come back soon!

Name: Restaurant Bord'Eau
Review Text: Updated review: Me and my partner dined here 2 weeks ago and did not have the best experience. ‚Ä¶

Name: Restaurant Bord'Eau
Review Text: a beautiful experience from start to finish. top-notch ingredients, flavours, wine list, and service.

Name: Restaurant Bord'Eau
Review Text: We got their Christmas box which was a three course dinner. It was a fun experience to assemble the food and great instruction videos. It took quite sometime to assemble everything. I really enjoyed the vegetables with fermented butter and pheasant with aligot. Can‚Äôt wait to visit the restaurant and have the full experience

Name: Restaurant Bord'Eau
Review Text: Visited here for the second time with my wife and brother. We booked the private dining room for the experience. Staff were very friendly and polite. We tried the 6 course tasting menu. It was based on the earth & sea. The quality and ‚Ä¶

Name: Restaurant Bord'Eau
Review Text: Star quality vegan (and non-vegan) cuisine! We are happy to know that the chef and his team have transformed the old-style menu into mostly plant-based dishes.  Every dish on the menu comes with a different texture and components.  It is ‚Ä¶

Name: Restaurant Bord'Eau
Review Text: Exceptional dining experience in the heart of Amsterdam. Elegant setting, top notch service, and incredibly inventive dishes. The new concept of "conscious" fine dining where every ingredient is thoughtfully sourced really resonated with us. Thanks for an unforgettable night!

Name: Restaurant Bord'Eau
Review Text: We had a 5-course menu which was really great. Every meal was of an excellent taste and interesting idea. The price was high but it was worth the experience!

Name: Restaurant Bord'Eau
Review Text: The location, atmosphere, view and service were all top-notch. For the most part, the food was very good. I did not enjoy the Pigeon at the end of the tasting menu, but that aside it was a very enjoyable dining experience.

Name: Restaurant Bord'Eau
Review Text: One of the best star restaurants in Amsterdam. It took us months to get a table. But it was worth the wait. Service is fantastic. Food full of well balanced flavours without being overwhelming. Presentation is beautiful and the view of the canal gives a very cozy feeling. Prices are normal for this type of restaurants. Recommend.

Name: Restaurant Bord'Eau
Review Text: Great culinary experiece!

Name: Restaurant Bord'Eau
Review Text: Simply excellent. The service is attentive without being invasive and the evening meal is filling and brilliant. Well worth trying.

Name: Restaurant Bord'Eau
Review Text: Wonderful tasting menu and wine pairing.  You must get a coffee or tea at the end so you can enjoy the tree.

Name: Restaurant Bord'Eau

Name: Restaurant Bord'Eau
Review Text: Been here 3 times before. Looking at the total bill and what it was when I visited the first time about 4 years ago, it has not excited me. Review Text: Dining at Bord'Eau was, for me, a very pleasant surprise: WELL above what I expected. I will be back the next chance I get, and only hope it hasn't changed by then.
